questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the dominant three-dimensional shape of this wheeled luggage?
What is the primary color visually observed across the majority of the luggage's exterior?
What appears to be the primary material composing the visible exterior shell of the suitcase?
Observing the handle's construction, what material is predominantly used in its manufacture?
Based on the image, how many wheels are visibly supporting this piece of luggage?
What is the visible texture of the main luggage body, smooth or rough to the touch?
Does the design feature any prominent external pockets or compartments?
Focusing on the zippers, what color are these components on the main compartment?
What is the design style of the luggage, focusing on its visible aesthetic details?
Considering the wheels, what is the apparent material composing the wheels themselves?
What is the overall design of the handle, single or telescopic?
Is there any visible branding or logo present on the luggage’s exterior?
What color is the accent strip visible at the suitcase's base?
Focusing on the wheels, what type of wheels are they; swivel or fixed?
Describe the visible fastening mechanism of the main compartment, is it a zip?
